name: The Legendary Hero Of Space
description:
The Legendary Hero Of Space is a space shooter. Your goal is to gain as many points as possible an survive for as long as you can. The more points you gain the harder the game gets.

This game is currently in development.

Plans:

-Enemy creation / Modding

-Inventory/Items

-Level Editor / Dedicated levels

-Local Leader-board / Online Leader-board

Credits:

Developer / Publisher: Four Winged Studio

Artist: HammaHead Cartoons
